content: fp wear toddler scarflette this is a quick scarf for a small person a great way to use up your scraps of worsted weight yarn no buttons or knots required for this pattern as the end of the scarf tucks through a small sleeve on the reverse side rating beginner this pattern uses standard us abbreviations materials  25 skein worsted weight wool such as bernat satin main color = mc  1 skein worsted weight contrast yarn such as bernat satin contrast color = cc  crochet hook us f/3 75 mm  stitch marker  yarn needle notes i made the sleeve part with the contrast color because i was using up yarn scraps but it would look nice done in the main color as well this pattern could easily be adjusted to fit a larger child or adult by adding extra row in the main body of the scarf special stitch extended single_crochet esc hook through next stitch yarn over and pull loop back through the work 2 loops on hook yarn over pull through first loop on the hook 2 loops on hook yarn over pull through remaining 2 loops on hook main section using mc chain 82 row 1 double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook *esc in next chain double_crochet in next chain* repeat pattern across pattern the terms of use fp wear row 2 chain 2 counts as first stitch throughout turn *double_crochet in next esc esc in next double_crochet* repeat across row 3-8 repeat row 2 row 9 repeat row 2 but on last yarn over of the row use cc to complete the stitch cut tail for mc and weave end in continue in cc edging continuing in cc chain 1 single_crochet in each stitch along the long edge of the scarf at corner single_crochet 3 times and continue along the short edge of the scarf stitch 9 single_crochet evenly along the short edge single_crochet 3 in corner single_crochet in each stitch along the other long edge of the scarf 3 single_crochet in corner 9 single_crochet evenly across short edge slip_stitch to first single_crochet do not fasten_off sleeve row 1 chain 2 turn *double_crochet in back loop of next single_crochet esc in back loop of next single_crochet* repeat 5 times 11 stitches sleeve row 2 chain 2 turn *esc in next double_crochet double_crochet in next esc* repeat across 11 stitches sleeve row 3 chain 2 turn *double_crochet in next esc esc in next double_crochet* repeat across sleeve row 4-10 repeat edge row 2 & 3 ending with edge row 2 sleeve row 11 chain 1 turn fold sleeve portion back on main body of scarf yarn over with mc and continuing with mc slip_stitch across main scarf to secure sleeve to main this will create your scarf sleeve fasten_off cut
